overview: Recorded at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, New York, April 9th, 1996.  1 Stone Free (Jimi Hendrix) 3:41  2 Prayer For The Dying (Gus Isidore, Seal) 3:46  3 Future Love Paradise 5:14  4 Blues In E 4:27  5 Crazy 5:13  6 Quicksand (David Bowie) 5:02  7 Kiss From A Rose 4:34  8 Violet 5:24  9 Deep Water 3:31  10 Don't Cry  3:16
title: Seal MTV Unplugged
